history.content:
As promised, the Fall 2018 webcast list can be found below. 

First, please note new for Fall 2018, the enrollment system will allow time conflicts between CompSci classes and other classes. However, even though CalCentral will allow enrollment into both classes, it is still the student’s responsibility to plan their schedule carefully. Departments and faculty are NOT required or expected to accommodate students’ schedule conflicts, and the Instructor of Record may decline to enroll or Instructor Drop a student from a class if they cannot be present for all schedule activities, including midterms and finals. Best practice is to speak to the instructors before enrolling in time conflicted classes.

Additionally, this list is intended to help crowd-source information, saving students, staff, & faculty emails regarding webcasting. It will be updated with a large delay. classes.berkeley.edu continues to be the reliable place to find updates regarding faculty and courses being blocked for enrollment.

Link Here

As you'll see, not all faculty responded. Therefore, I would appreciate TAs with concrete knowledge of the answers posting or sending me anything they know.
history.subject: Fall 2018 Webcast List
